content.original: A Hand Actuator specifically designed for the OmniPods of a OmniMech. Allows to add a Hand Actuator even on OmniChassis normally not fitting these. Requires a Lower Arm or OmniPod Lower Arm Actuator. CANNOT BE USED WITH ARM MOUNTED BALLISTICS OR PPC'S.
content.prevOriginal: A Hand Actuator specifically designed for the OmniPods of a OmniMech. Allows to add a Hand Actuator even on OmniChassis normally not fitting these. Requires a Lower Arm or OmniPod Lower Arm Actuator. CANNOT BE USED WITH ARM MOUNTED BALLISTICS OR PPC'S.
content.content: 专为泛用机甲的泛用吊舱设计手部机构.即使原本泛用底盘不适配也可以加装手部机构.需要标准小臂机构或泛用小臂吊舱机构. 不可以和臂装弹道武器或臂装粒子炮一起使用.

content.original: Chance to stand up improved by actuator
content.prevOriginal: Chance to stand up improved by actuator
content.content: 伺服机构提高了站立的机会

content.original: A Lower Arm Actuator specifically designed for the OmniPods of a OmniMech. Allows to add a Lower Arm Actuator even on OmniChassis normally not fitting these. CANNOT BE USED WITH ARM MOUNTED BALLISTICS OR PPC'S.
content.prevOriginal: A Lower Arm Actuator specifically designed for the OmniPods of a OmniMech. Allows to add a Lower Arm Actuator even on OmniChassis normally not fitting these. CANNOT BE USED WITH ARM MOUNTED BALLISTICS OR PPC'S.
content.content: 专为泛用机甲的泛用吊舱设计小臂机构.即使原本泛用底盘不适配也可以加装小臂机构. 不可以和臂装弹道武器或臂装粒子炮一起使用.

content.original: Chance to stand up improved by actuator
content.prevOriginal: Chance to stand up improved by actuator
content.content: 伺服机构提高了站立的机会

content.original: An Actuator Enhancement System that can be fit on OmniMechs inplace of Lower Arm and Hand Actuators enabling a superior control and targetting system for that Arm
content.prevOriginal: An Actuator Enhancement System that can be fit on OmniMechs inplace of Lower Arm and Hand Actuators enabling a superior control and targetting system for that Arm
content.content: 一种可以安装在泛用性机甲上代替下臂和手部机构以启用超控和瞄准系统的伺服机构增强系统

content.original: An OmniMech is a highly configurable type of BattleMech. OmniMechs mount some of their loadout in modular OmniPods. This gives Omnis the ability to replace damaged components and change battlefield role to fulfill mission requirements. Though not solely created for modular weapon loadouts, the OmniMech design greatly aids repair and construction. Once their modular weaponry and equipment is removed, the empty bays provide better access to repair the chassis. Damaged components such as arms and legs can be easily repaired in half the time it takes for common BattleMechs.
content.prevOriginal: An OmniMech is a highly configurable type of BattleMech. OmniMechs mount some of their loadout in modular OmniPods. This gives Omnis the ability to replace damaged components and change battlefield role to fulfill mission requirements. Though not solely created for modular weapon loadouts, the OmniMech design greatly aids repair and construction. Once their modular weaponry and equipment is removed, the empty bays provide better access to repair the chassis. Damaged components such as arms and legs can be easily repaired in half the time it takes for common BattleMechs.
content.content: 泛用机甲(OmniMech)是一种高度可配置的作战机甲.泛用机甲将部分装载物安装在模块化的泛用舱(OmniPod)中.这使泛用机甲能更换损坏配件并改变战场角色以满足任务要求.虽然不是专为模块化武器装载而设计,但泛用机甲的设计极大地帮助了维修和建造.一旦他们的模块化武器和设备被拆除,泛用机甲就可以使用模块化的武器和设备来完成任务,空托架为维修底盘提供了更好的通道.损坏的部件,如手臂和腿,可以用普通机甲所需时间的一半完成恢复.

content.original: PASSIVE: This unit is GUARDED (50% damage reduction against ranged attacks to the front and side) from remaining stationary.Increases Melee Damage by 10%.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: This unit is GUARDED (50% damage reduction against ranged attacks to the front and side) from remaining stationary.Increases Melee Damage by 10%.
content.content: 被动:该单位从剩余的稳定中获得<<保护>>(减免50%从侧面和前面的范围攻击伤害). 提升10%近战伤害.

content.original: Provides 70 stability and -20% stability damage taken.
content.prevOriginal: Provides 70 stability and -20% stability damage taken.
content.content: 提供70稳定并且-20%受到的稳定伤害.
降低即将到来的稳定伤害

content.content: 陀螺仪有助于机甲稳定重心

content.original: Created by RISC Technicians is this derivative of the Experimental Dreadnought Gyro made to fit the Catapult III OmniMech
content.prevOriginal: Created by RISC Technicians is this derivative of the Experimental Dreadnought Gyro made to fit the Catapult III OmniMech

content.original: Designed to make use of the experimental Interface System developed by the Word of Blake based on Clan Protomech designs, this cockpit completely removes the need for a BattleMech Gyro and is a custom fit for the Skinwalker.
content.prevOriginal: Designed to make use of the experimental Interface System developed by the Word of Blake based on Clan Protomech designs, this cockpit completely removes the need for a BattleMech Gyro and is a custom fit for the Skinwalker.
content.content: 以利用氏族原型机甲设计为基础被布莱克之道开发出的实验性交互系统,该座舱完全不需要战斗机甲陀螺仪,是专为'皮肤行者'定制的

content.original: Based upon Comstar's groundbreaking XL gyro has Vining Engineering and Salvage Team managed to push the technology even further, further reducing the weight of the mechs gyro, but doubling its size going even into the side Torsos.
content.prevOriginal: Based upon Comstar's groundbreaking XL gyro has Vining Engineering and Salvage Team managed to push the technology even further, further reducing the weight of the mechs gyro, but doubling its size going even into the side Torsos.
content.content: 以通迅之星开创性的超轻型陀螺仪为基础,维宁工程和打捞团队成功进一步推进了该技术,进一步减轻了机甲陀螺仪的重量,但将其尺寸扩大了一倍,甚至延伸到侧面躯干.

content.original: Based upon Comstar's groundbreaking XL gyro has Vining Engineering and Salvage Team managed to push the technology even further, further reducing the weight of the mechs gyro, but doubling its size going even into the side Torsos.
content.prevOriginal: Based upon Comstar's groundbreaking XL gyro has Vining Engineering and Salvage Team managed to push the technology even further, further reducing the weight of the mechs gyro, but doubling its size going even into the side Torsos.
content.content: 以通迅之星开创性的超轻型陀螺仪为基础,维宁工程和打捞团队成功进一步推进了该技术,进一步减轻了机甲陀螺仪的重量,但将其尺寸扩大了一倍,甚至延伸到侧面躯干.
